results.title: How to send a detailed report through email notification when testcases are run through azure pipeline? - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: I'm running automation testcases in azure pipeline using yaml. I've used Cypress automation tool and automated salesforce. Thanks in advance| To get detailed test case reports in your emails, you need to add a custom step to your pipeline to parse the results and send a custom notification. Here are the required steps: Step 1: Generate a Detailed.

results.title: Cypress Touchpad gestures not working on Windows 11 - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: My touchpad hardware ID ( ), Dell Inspiron 3493, and that gestures worked on Windows 10 but fail on Windows 11 due to driver blocks| Dear bajrang SONI , Thank you for reaching out to the Microsoft Q&A Forum. Your gestures fail because the specific Dell/Cypress driver, the one that enables these advanced features, is not active. Disclaimer:.
